description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2016
http://gotoams.nl

Juergen Hoeller - Co-founder of the Spring Framework Project

ABSTRACT
The Spring team is busily working on Spring Framework 5.0, with a release candidate scheduled for Q4 2016.
This presentation covers the key themes in Spring 5, based on the current state of development: going Java 8+ across the entire framework codebase [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/amsterdam-2016/presentation/Spring%20Framework%205.0%20-%20Preview%20&%20Roadmap

https://twitter.com/gotoamst
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com

title: Spring Framework 5.0 - Preview & Roadmap
